long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Health Reminder: Your Personal Wellness Assistant

Stay healthy while browsing with Health Reminder, the ultimate Chrome extension for maintaining your well-being during long computer sessions.

Key Features:
ğŸ§˜â€â™‚ï¸ Customizable Stretch Reminders
ğŸ’§ Timely Hydration Alerts
ğŸ”Š Optional Sound Notifications
ğŸ›ï¸ Adjustable Reminder Intervals
ğŸ“Š Real-time Progress Tracking

How It Works:
1. Set your preferred intervals for stretch and drink reminders.
2. Enable/disable sound notifications as desired.
3. Let Health Reminder take care of your wellness while you focus on your work.

Why Choose Health Reminder:
- Prevent eye strain and muscle stiffness
- Maintain proper hydration throughout the day
- Boost productivity with regular, healthy breaks
- Easy-to-use interface with progress indicators
- Customizable to fit your personal schedule

Perfect for office workers, students, and anyone spending extended periods at the computer. Health Reminder helps you maintain a balance between work and well-being, ensuring you stay healthy and productive.

Download Health Reminder today and transform your browsing habits for better health!

Keywords: health reminder, stretch alert, hydration reminder, workplace wellness, productivity tool, browser extension, eye strain prevention, ergonomic assistant, desk job health, computer break timer
